mutants.original_line: script = re.sub(r'\W+', ' ', script)  # Remove all non-alphabetic characters
mutants.code:
import re
from collections import defaultdict

def find_palindrome_frequency(script):
    script = script.lower()
    script = re.sub('', ' ', script)
    words = script.split()
    word_frequencies = defaultdict(int)
    for word in words:
        if word == word[::-1]:
            word_frequencies[word] += 1
    return word_frequencies

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def find_palindrome_frequency(script):
    script = script.lower()
    script = re.sub('\\W+', '', script)
    words = script.split()
    word_frequencies = defaultdict(int)
    for word in words:
        if word == word[::-1]:
            word_frequencies[word] += 1
    return word_frequencies

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def find_palindrome_frequency(script):
    script = script.lower()
    script = re.sub('\\W+', ' ', script)
    words = script.split()
    word_frequencies = defaultdict(int)
    for word in words:
        if word != word[::-1]:
            word_frequencies[word] += 1
    return word_frequencies

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def find_palindrome_frequency(script):
    script = script.lower()
    script = re.sub('\\W+', ' ', script)
    words = script.split()
    word_frequencies = defaultdict(int)
    for word in words:
        if word == word[::-1]:
            word_frequencies[word] -= 1
    return word_frequencies

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def find_palindrome_frequency(script):
    script = script.lower()
    script = re.sub('\\W+', ' ', script)
    words = script.split()
    word_frequencies = defaultdict(int)
    for word in words:
        if word == word[::--1]:
            word_frequencies[word] += 1
    return word_frequencies
